original_text: Do not think only about the things that you want to do for yourself. Each of you should think also about how you can help other people.
korean_text: 각각 자기 일을 돌볼뿐더러 또한 각각 다른 사람들의 일을 돌보아 나의 기쁨을 충만하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Do not think only about the things
that you want to do for yourself.
sentences.korean_translation: 너 스스로를 위해 하고 싶은 것들

sentences.original_text: Each of you should think also
about how you can help other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어떻게 다른 사람들을 도울 수 있는지에 대해
